### 1. Description of the bug
Describe the bug along with what you expected to happen instead.

### 2. Your SillyTavern version + branch
Actual numbers, not just "latest"

### 3. Your extension version + branch
Actual numbers, not just "latest"

### 4. Your device and browser
desktop, iphone, android, etc..
chrome, firefox, edge, etc...

### 5. Model information
Whether you are using **Text Completion** or **Chat Completion**, and any other relevant information regarding your model (model name, provider, backend, etc).

### 6. Troubleshooting
Let me know that you read the [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/qvink/SillyTavern-MessageSummarize#troubleshooting) section, and what didn't work or if your issue wasn't there.

### 7. Steps to reproduce
These should be numbered steps to reproduce the bug starting with a **minimal environment**. This means starting with creating a new, blank chat, using default settings for the extension, and disabling all other extensions. Then record every action you take up until you see something unexpected happen along with what you **expected** to happen instead. 

1. Disable all other extensions.
2. Open a new, blank chat.
3. Open the config for this extension, scroll to the bottom, and click "Revert Settings".
4. Go to "..."
5. Click on "..."
6. etc...
7. Observe [thing happening]. This is expected.
8. Do something else
9. Observe [thing happening]. This is unexpected. I expected [other thing] to happen instead.

### 8. Error messages
Any errors that you see in the ST terminal or browser console. You can access the browser console with F12 in most browsers.

### 9. Screenshots
Any screenshots you have of the issue occurring, if applicable.

...
